scripts.offline-local: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && serverless offline --stage local
scripts.offline-develop: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && serverless offline --stage develop
scripts.deploy-header-lambda: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && sls deploy function --function cf-header --stage dev --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy-develop: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && sls deploy --stage dev --verbose
scripts.sls:info: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && sls info --verbose | tee .slsinfo
scripts.debug: export AWS_PROFILE=sandbox_consorcio && export AWS_REGION=us-east-1 && node --inspect ./node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline --aws-profile sandbox_consorcio --stage develop --port 3003
